caption: Sausage pizza was good!

Don't get slices to go or they may end of serving u this. Clearly these r from lunch, note the old cheese under the fresh they tried to hide it with. Next time just say you don't have any slices available guys

Since finding out my body can't properly digest white and whole wheat flours, I really thought I would be stuck making my own pizza at home from now on. But I soon discovered that Potomac Pizza has a delicious gluten free pizza option that is perfect! I love that you can completely customize it and still get the fun Potomac toppings like the spinach ricotta! I can't wait to continue ordering from here. I also love the portions, I have been ordering from here long before I realized I shouldn't have gluten and they have incredible portions of appetizers, enough for a big group, and wonderful normal pizza too!!

Pros: 🏆 Great food 😋 Friendly staff 🤗 Delicious 😋 Big slice 🍕 Handicap accessible ♿ Handicap parking ♿ 🅿  Cons: 😩 Not sure 🤔  Had a slice of pepperoni here and it was covered with, good crust, good sauce, over all it was good but it could use a bit more flavor.  If you like the review and/or the photos/videos, please hit "like 👍" below to let me know, it is much appreciated 😊.
Very clean and welcoming place. They serve big portions and for affordable rates. We loved the menu a lot and the staff members were super welcoming and chatty. Recommended.
Great Food & service
This place knows how to take care of their customers. Consistently with a super friendly mindset. The food is affordably priced, constantly tasty and neat.

I have lived in Chevy Chase for longer than I care to admit, yet never once went to Potomac Pizza. It took a fundraising event to get me to order from them and I glad that I did. Ordering online was easy, including the option to select the fundraiser group. We arrived, pizza was ready and hot. It was probably ready sooner than they said it would be, slower Thursday night. Pizza itself was delicious! I've long been a Vace fan, but Vace has nothing on Potomac Pizza. Since it was carry out, can't speak to anything inside service wise but the people at the counter were friendly and helpful. We will definitely return.
The service is consistently efficient, lovely vibes, very kind staff. Will return again when I arrive in the area.

At the moment  you enter that place  they give you a great feeling. Very courteous hosts, it is a kind restaurant to  pass time with friends and colleagues or with your date. delightful  cooking, specialist  chef, comfortable  price and courteous  service. Highly recommended.
Good food. Fast service.
I've been here a hundred times and I will go a hundred more. This place is never a disappointment, no matter how long the wait is.
Pizza is delicious! Staff are super friendly
The pizza was ok
Wow love it
Finest spot to buy food when in a hurry. The service is efficient, pricing is reasonable, excellent atmosphere. Keep up the good work
Love the Pizza!!!
🥵 excellent 🤤
Potomac Pizza has the best salads ever 👍🏿👍🏿

Today was my first and will be my last time ordering from this establishment. Not only did I receive an entirely different pasta dish than what I ordered (ordered chicken alfredo & received chicken parm) with NO explanation. I also discovered well into eating my Ceasar salad that there was a huge fly in it!! Im utterly disgusted with this. I couldn’t have imagined paying what I paid for the worst quality experience on all fronts. If you’re thinking of ordering from here, don’t.
Had a great experience in here with my son. The food was served fast and the customer service is just awesome. Prices are convenient.
Their pizza is perfect!! Sandwiches ... AMAZING!! So much yummy stuff. Thank you Potomac Pizza, you never disappoint!

We order a large number of pizza's from Potomac Pizza on a regular basis for our school and they always work with us to make 2 deliveries so that all the kids get a hot lunch. It is a favorite day when the students smell Potomac pizza throughout the hallways. Thank you for always being so professional.
Nice reliable local pizza joint with great Tuesday special.
Great food, great drinks and outstanding service
Ask for Andy, he's a terrific waiter.
Huge improvement on tap beers! Thanks!!
Pizza was cold after doing carry out order, only a 5 minute drive home too.
I adore this place a lot. there is a friendly air. The meals are exeptionaly good. the service is efficient and the waiters are professional. The cost is decent. I highly recommend.

I come to this excellent place from time to time since I like the  special atmosphere that is unique to this place. The crew is awfuly attentive and professional. The service is very fast. Also, the food they prepare is excellent. I have been there more than once and I was always satisfied. The cost is reasobable. I recommend this place to to all.
Great eat in pizza
The staff is great very friendly everytime we go .

Ordered two personal (small) pizzas. Nothing special. The crust was decent. Way overpriced!!! $25 for both. Probably won't make another trip. The wait service was nice, answered questions about sauce due to allergy concerns.
Good pizza
Relatively greasy pizza. Mediterranean salad is fair. Nothing special.
The customer service is constantly efficient, fantastic mood, very nice staff. I will visit here again when I arrive nearby.
Pizza that reminds me of the stuff I grew up on in Italian-American S. Jersey.
The lasagna has no ricotta cheese...!
Delicious food at a great price
Pizza is great
Great pizza.
Some of the best Pizza at a very reasonable price .
Good bread and pizza but than bitting fly in there was terrible must be a lot of those flies around Maryland

I was excited to try this place. I was very underwhelmed. The pizza was okay. The majority of the cheese stayed in the carry-out box. The center of the pie was super soft so when I would pick up a slice half the slice and the cheese stayed stuck on the box.
Good food and amazing service. They went above and beyond.
It's the place where they remember you and your order!
Pizza is alright but wait service can take ages; take it to go
Delicious food, generous portions, wonderful atmosphere! A hidden gem in Friendship Heights.
The "Ultimate Potomac Pizza" is delicious and so are the chocolate chip cookies
The worst pizza I have ever had
Love this restaurant!  Great food, friendly service, good pricing and clean locale.

I wanted to like this place on a lot of levels.  I gave them 2 tries before writing this review. Online order both times.  First time ordered walked to the store to pick it up.  I sat there for another 5 minutes before they told me that one of the ingredients for the pizza want available and they had to cancel the order.  Didn't even offer a discount or anything for the trouble.  2nd time made an online order and they didn't even start it till the pick up time and I had to ask them twice at the counter where the pizza was before someone realized it wasn't even started.  In the end the pizzas were good, service not much so.
Delicious!
Love it.

Sorry its was cold and nasty I am glad I didn't order for my whole store like we do every Saturday. I didn't know pizza could be nasty and it look nasty. But my team was hungry so they ate it. I didn't because I can not eat nasty food. Sorry that was a big waste of money. Never again  now I have to wait til I go home to eat at 6pm. SMH

I am a huge anchovy pizza fan and not many people can nail it, but they sure as heck did! The cheese was just the right amount, the sauce was consistent, and the flavor... Amazing. I loved it. The only thing I could complain about was the wait, however, what do you expect when something is good and everybody knows about it!
Good pizza
Great place for a veg burger and fries, would highly recommend.
Great pizza and even better strombolis.
Yummy ! Great pizza . Ultimate Potomac had a ton of delicious toppings !
friendly staff, good pizza but I love their subs, with a beer... perfect combination!
Some dang good pizza! Certainly the best I've had in the DC area!
Either the pizza or the jalapeno poppers have me the runs
Great service and pizza!
Great service and good food
Great tasting pizzas, best is that the crust is dairy free.
Their pizza is delicious and has a large amount of toppings. Service is great during the busy lunch hour. Their calzones look great! I'm excited to try it next time.
Good Place! I have ordered from them many times.

Potomac pizza is a good joint with fine diner food, $2 beers, and live sports. The waiters are attentive and as quick as the kitchen allows.  The restaurant is VERY child friendly. Every table except for one had a family with at least one small child. Luckily the kids weren't upset but the restaurant has tiled walls and floors so it would get loud quickly.  In general though it was clean, nothing terribly remarkable, but nothing at all bad.
Love the waitstaff here and service.  Great food for the price!

Great pizza and very friendly staff. We got the Veggie pizza, which a lot of places don't know how to do. It always ends up soggy, but they got it right. The crust was also delicious, thick and fluffy. We will definitely be coming back.
Great pizza
This place is unreal!
Prices are good not too expensive.Definitely looking forward to be back and try other pizza.
Friendly service, great 🍕
Guy on the phone name PATRICK WAS VERY RUDE. Bad customer service.
This is the greatest pizza place in the history of pizza places. Try the wings.
Tuesday special is the best. Second pizza for 99 cents! Cheese fries and a pitcher of Blue Moon.
Plenty of kid friendly food besides pizza. They recently renovated dinning room, so it's actually pretty nice to have dinner and watch games on TV. They also validate parking

We order delivery from Potomac Pizza on occasion because one of the people in the house likes their burgers.  Third time that I've eaten delivery from them over a fair span of time and all three times, for me, have been extremely sub-par.  I order Steak and Cheese and Fries.  I'm not expecting the best sub ever but the meat is bland and the sub roll is just meh, like Wonder Bread. Not the worst but for 9 bucks I'd like a little bit more flavor and a better roll.  My REAL pet peeve however is the Fries.  The fries here are AWFUL.  They are limp, colorless, and devoid of anything remotely resembling flavor.  It's as if they take the fries out of the freezer, let them sit till they thaw and then, briefly, dunk them in warm oil to bring them up, slightly, from room temperature.  Honestly, they should be ashamed of their fries.  No more. Third Strike and yer out Potomac Pizza.

Great lunch specials but it can be hit or miss. Usually it's pretty good, but last time I went it looked like they threw the toppings on at the last minute and didn't actually put it in the oven. My toppings literally fell off the pizza and you could see it was just a cheese slice with an attempt to add toppings. However the time before, it was pretty good. Just wish it was consistent.

This is the place for Italian food. Good to excellent service, waitress and waiters are very accommodating. You can have a beer or wine with your meal. Better that any other Italian restaurant in the area. The pizzas are great you can ask to make your own pizza.
(Translated by Google) Good pizzas and variety of dishes  (Original) Buenas pizzas y variedad de platos
Great pizza. Dough is soft and chewy, as I prefer. Cooks will split toppings on a pie to share. Fantastic BOGO deals on Tuesday.
Delicious vegetarian calzones. The marinara sauce is also top notch. Would come here again!
Pizza is good albeit a bit pricey $3-4 a slice. 10% off if you work in the area. The guy who took my order was very friendly.
Pizza is delicious. Thick dough and cheese. Fast delivery service too
Great service and friendly, casual atmosphere.  Food was very good.  Very happy we went there!
The food was great. The service was slow. Staff watching football (soccer).
Hard to find a decent NYC style pizza in the area, and they have decent beer and happy hour! Staff is very friendly as well.

Caesar salad tasted watery, maybe the lettuce was soaking in water or something before being served or in the days prior. The buffalo chicken sandwich had good breast meat but the hot sauce was applied in a way that soaked into the bread and could not taste it at all.

Staff are friendly locals (ALL CAPS!) dining area is relatively clean.  Big TV on the wall lends to a good place to chill and watch sports.  Pizza is NY style,  thin bottom crust with thick outer crust.  Dough,  Sauce and cheese are great. Local franchise is one of my favorite pizza places.
The pizza is delicious.
My daughters love the pepperoni pizza!
Decent food, nice family restaurant
Amazing one of a kind place with great food & friendly service!
(Translated by Google) Excellent pizza  (Original) Excelent pizza
Great pizza

I had 6 very hungry 9 year old boys to host.  Potomac Pizza not only delivered at the time I needed them to show up, the pizzas were a hit with the boys.  Thanks Potomac Pizza for getting me & the guys through that Sunday afternoon.
Pizza was good, buffalo wings were good, fries were good, mozzarella sticks were good...happy with our trip to Potomac Pizza.
Amazing hometown pizza! Nothing fancy, just come on in- sit anywhere, just good pizza, beer, wine, and garlic knots, and, well... just about everything on the menu. :)
Great customer service
Always on point. Great lunch stop during the week.
They served me a hair with a cheese steak on it.
Decent food and friendly competent staff. I eat there about once a week.

Pizza over priced for what is. Service was terrible. In a eventually empty restaurant on a Friday night, several staff sitting around. Our "Waiter" has to be saught out for everything. No training or experience with this person. Good mozzarella sticks from wherever they get them supplied.
Great pizza!
Always nice staff and great food
Great lunch place
On Nov. 6th, I was given a bill of $9.53 on a Master Card for a $3.17 slice of pizza. (I retain all receipts.)  It took almost 15 minutes to correct the situation.  Good pizza, but baaad service!
$2 beers on Thursdays. Great wings. Friendly service.

The place has excellent pizza and a very good customers service. I usually buy my pizzas here and the last time My order took more than normal (30 minutes) and when I asked what's wrong I got a total refund and a drink. Honestly also coming from Europe I'm picky but I must say it's one of the best pizza's I've eaten in the U.S. Prices are normal and quantities are exactly what you pay for. Highly recommend the meat lovers pizza

Food is good but manager is horrible. He berrated employees in front of me. The employee he berrated was a Black man so it seemed like an issue of race. He did not speak to the  other non-Black employees that way. I believe that there could have been a better way to handle it. I will never return again. Completely disgusting!
The pizza is awesome and its in a great neighborhood.
Awesome place! Great food and prices. Andy is always great.
Good service and family atmosphere.
Product quality is very good, customer service is very good, and general vibe is good.
Loves the fries with cheese and bacon.
Great pizza at a reasonable price.
Decent pizza, but individual size is a rip off. Just get a medium instead. Waiter asked if I wanted change. $20 on a $10 bill. You serious bro?

I really love the pizza and staff is very nice, my only complaint is that every time I place an order the pizza arrives cold and sometimes the cheese is stuck to the top of the box, which is kind of disappointing. I however keep ordering because the pizza is really good, highly recommend but delivery is horrible, please improve the delivery service.
The pizza is delicious but was a little expensive... but so worth it!! The people pick up immediately and are very nice!!
Will do in a pinch.  Not the best.
Good food, prices and service.
Good pizza. On Tuesdays they have $2 draft beer
This rating is for the pizza only because the pizza is the only thing I've tried so far. Their pizza is the best.
Great selection of Salads!! Spinach Salad my Fav

I was excited upon walking into this establishment because I love love love pizza! Especially me being a New Yorker. That turned for the worse once I ordered my food and received a small, chuckie cheese sized cold slice of pizza. The cup of water was bigger than the slice of pizza. The French fries were good and the service as well...but I won't be back.
Their garlic knots are the best! And the one waiter makes an effort to know the regulars.
Service itself was great, the attitude of the server/waiter was sub par. Great place for a quick bite though.
Excellent calzones and a large selection of food on the menu.
I go on average 3 times a week, the staff is super friendly and food is delicious. I have tried anything from pasta to sandwich to pizza, my favorite is the pizza.

Great food, great atmosphere, great times! Servers were very friendly and knowledgeable. Great spot for both lunch and dinner - I could stay here all day. Salads are very fresh and the pizza is on point. Awesome place to watch a sprots game.
It was great
Terrible

Generally good but inconsistent delivery - last pizza was delivered cold but had been set sideways on the way so the cheese and toppings were stuck to the cardboard - it was disgusting all for the low low price of $18

Delivery - ordered two sandwiches, a Club and BLT, a side of fries and three cookies.  Both sandwiches were not correctly done.  The BLT was supposed to be toasted, it was not.  The bacon was clearly that precooked stuff that is more like gristle and good bacon.  The Club was on really thick bread but the meat, lettuce and cheese were thinly layered making for a terrible club.  I recognize that ordering french fries for delivery is a challenge.  However these were so badly undercooked they were inedible.  I guess the kitchen was too busy to do it right.  The only good thing were the cookies, and I suspect they did not come from the kitchen that prepared this awful meal.  We'll not be ordering again.

Potomac Pizza is my favorite lunch spot in friendship heights. There is a wide variety of lunch options, but the pizza is always my favorite. This is a neighborhood spot. Beer is cold and cheap, and the staff is awesome. Ask for Andy.
Loved it. Quick, clean, delicious. Great for our whole family.
I made a video review. It said 4 5/10. it was wrong. It was 5
Caesar salad was very good. Always appreciate dressing on the side. Pizza was decent. Had Pep and Mush..... Mush were fresh and tasty.... Ill be back and so should you.
Stopped in while on a trip. Ordered the meat calzone and did not disappoint.  It  was delicious and could feed two.
Honestly, it's just okay. I'd say 1 out of every 10 pizzas is good. If you can't get any other pizza and you're really in the mood for pizza, stop by here.

Stopped in for lunch and I'm SOOOOOOO glad I did..The pizza is very tasty aside for the oil from the cheese & pepperoni..The SALAD?! OMG, talk about a good and CRISP salad..FRESH!! I would LOVE to bring my family here..

Great Pizza with fresh high quality ingredients.  Very kid friendly and attentive staff.  There is also outside seating!  If you're tired of rubbery crust, cheap oily cheese and cooked-frozen toppings stop ordering Domino's and try this place.  Good beer options too.
Most of the food is mediocre but the pizza is actually getting pretty good.  Very kid friendly and convenient.
